card.name: Terror Pit
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

card.name: Dorballom, Lord of Demons
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Demon Commands. ■ Triple Breaker ■ When you put this creature, destroy all creatures except darkness creatures. Then each player puts all non-darkness cards in their mana zone into their graveyard.

card.name: Zamaru, Treasure of Darkness
card.text: ■ While all cards in your mana zone are darkness cards, this creature gets +2000 power. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, if all cards in your mana zone are darkness cards, your opponent discards a card at random from their hand.

card.name: Giganima, the Reaper
card.text: ■ When you put one of your other creatures that have "Reaper" in their Card Name

card.name: Bell Hell De Gaul, Footprint of the Reaper
card.text: ■ Whenever one of your opponent's creatures is destroyed, shuffle your deck. Then reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a non-evolution Demon Command, put it into the battle zone. If it's not, put it into your hand. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Olzekia, General of Decapitation
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your creatures. Then your opponent chooses 2 of their creatures and destroys them.

card.name: Bell Hell De Dios, Death Castle Beast Lord
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may destroy one of your creatures. If you do, draw 2 cards. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Death March, Reaper Puppeteer
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Graveyard evolution—Choose a darkness creature in your graveyard and put this card into the battle zone on top of that creature. ■ Whenever this creature battles, your opponent's creature gets -4000 power until the end of the battle. ''(A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.)''

card.name: Deathraios, Cursed Blade Reaper
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy one of your creatures that has "Reaper" in its name. If you do, your opponent chooses one of their creatures and destroys it.

card.name: Grave Robber Reaper Man
card.text: ■ Whenever your other creatures that have "Reaper" in their name are destroyed, you may draw a card.

card.name: Bell Hell De Bran, Battle Reaper
card.text: ■ This creature can attack untapped Knights, Samurai, and Shinobi. ■ Whenever this creature can attack, you may destroy one of your other creatures. If you do, this creature can attack untapped non-evolution creatures until the End Step ■ This creature can't attack players.

card.name: Reaper Hand
card.text: ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures. ■ If you have a creature that has "Reaper" in its name in the battle zone, your opponent discards a card from their hand.

card.name: Deathproof, Shadow Reaper
card.text: ■ Each of your other creatures in the battle zone that have "Reaper" in their names gets "slayer". ''(Whenever a creature that has "slayer" battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.)''

card.name: Bone Amigo, the Undead Reaper
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ When this creature attacks, destroy it after the attack.
